tickets.Subject: FOX515 Sync information cannot be retrieved from node via NMS Sync-Map
tickets.Case Description: In the Bahrain NMS the upload of the SDH Synchronization information from the Sync map fails for 3 nodes. For all other nodes it is working as expected. As a result the Sync map is not properly shown because the links are missing due to these 3 stations and it is displayed as multiple islands. However one can see that the origin of some islands are deriving their clocking signal from these nodes. If connected to the node with UCST the sync information can be uploaded as expected and is also selected as expected (no loop). During some reconfigurations recentyl done on IP and OSPF areas of these nodes the COBUX have been restarted but the problem is still existing in these nodes. Also they have been removed from the NMS and added to a new Elementr Agent but without success.
tickets.Case Resolution Description: Case can be closed after discussion with local service engineer.

tickets.Subject: FOX515 SYN4E "AU-AIS"
tickets.Case Description: Beim Fox Kommunikationssystem kommt eine Fehlermeldung. Der Text lautet Server Signal State "AU-AIS". Der Alarm erscheint jedoch gibt es keine Störung. Herr Kleemann von der EWZ bittet Do.11.04. um Rückruf.
tickets.Case Resolution Description: No solution due to FOX515 life cycle

tickets.Subject: FOXMAN-UN TCP session handling
tickets.Case Description: After call with CKW it is more clear. The previous attached Firewall log is showing TCP flows which are denied because the TCP sessions are not done correctly. If the TCP flow is not as per standard (e.g. in case the server tries to establish a TCP session which is already established), the statefull Firewall is detecting that and blocking it. So if the server and nodes are establishing the connections according to the TCP standard, no issue. ABB to look in to the behaviour of FOXMAN-UN / DIRAC to analyze why the TCP flow is not repected in all cases. A statefull Firwal, like in CKW is detecting this, blocking it and alerting the user.
tickets.Case Resolution Description: R&D informed fix is available on R17A

tickets.Subject: ESW System upgrade SAMO5 procedure with two short interruptions fails
tickets.Case Description: Yesterday I tried to perform the SAMO5 EQP esw system upgrade from esw R4A16 to R4B06 and it fails multiple times. I followed the procedure with two small 50 ms interruptions because that is the way we want to do esw system upgrades in the future. I managed to reproduce the fault and it appears that, after the successful upgrade of the standby SAMO5 and the manual switch from working to protecting SAMO5 unit, the procedure fails just before performing the last step. Just after you pressed the Save to NE button followed by the start software button for the upgrade of the working SAMO5 towards R4B06, you often get suddenly the alarm ?incompatible software mismatch?. The traffic which is running on that moment over de SDH ports on the working unit is interrupted. The causes an outage for a very long time because in order to resolve you need to do a ?Start in boot? for the working SAMO5 after which you can select the correct software to start. Btw I did manage to do at least one successful upgrade also. Have the impression that when the time between you do a ?Save to NE? and the ?Start upgrade? is too big, that has something to do with this fault. Anyway this shouldn?t happening and we need to trust 100% on working procedures certainly if traffic interruption is no option. I took a video of the manipulations I did during the SAMO5 upgrade which was done according the written procedure. I saved all the necessary files from the node and I will upload this to a new issue log.
tickets.Case Resolution Description: Feedback ELIA by 11.10.2023: Since this is an older esw release, there is no need to redo this upgrade as we are currently on a higher esw software than r4b06. Therefore this ticket can be closed

tickets.Subject: SNC in Networking package but not on node-can't be deleted
tickets.Case Description: There is an SNC in the Networking Package that is not on the node and cannot be deleted.  Cross connect is not on the Node but cannot be removed from the Manager. The SNC is in Saggart HS #2 and is called Alarm Mgmt Maynooth 1-Derriron We have tried an NP resynch and a NP resynch-f to no avail

tickets.Subject: ENP: no confirmation when deleting a service
tickets.Case Description: When using ENP (R14A), and selecting a service (VPWS or VPLS), with right-mouse click when by mistake users clicks on to delete the service, there is no confirmation requested to avoid wrong clicks. Can this somehow be activated? If not, can this be implemented?

tickets.Subject: UNEM GBT NP out of synch
tickets.Case Description: UNEM1 ERWE und UNEM2 BOWT NP out of synch  SBB Ticket TT668988 Abgesprochen mit Andrè Bemsel
tickets.Case Resolution Description: npresynch on unem1 and unem2 executed

tickets.Subject: AMO EOS port- Intermittendly failing
tickets.Case Description: Previous ticket logged for intermittently failing EOS port which has reoccurred. Closed ticket ref 20200521-5012026. Please investigate
tickets.Case Resolution Description: Differential Delay changed to reset GFP synchronisation

tickets.Subject: max bandwidth of TDM mgmt ports on 615
tickets.Case Description: What is the maximum bandwidth of all TDM mgmt ports together on a 615 mux?  We have a node that has 7 x P12 links and 3 x 192k links on one of our 615 muxes and we now only have limited bandwidth remaining. Can the default bandwidth be increased? Thanks

Der Standort ist in Hohtenn. Können Sie das kontrollieren? Gruss Björn Raduner 079 665 63 45 BLS Netz AG Holen Sie sich Outlook für Android

tickets.Subject: Job collection are created, but cntr_g826 table not filled.
tickets.Case Description: Hi,  After a power cut at the end of June, "PM collection" are recreated but the PMs are no longer collected in the PM_DATABASE (the last ones collected are from before the power cut). Best regards SALIHA
tickets.Case Resolution Description: UNEM server is not accessible. I will recreate case as soon as the engineer is available and on site again Best Regards SALIHA

tickets.Subject: NMS and NP backups
tickets.Case Description: Hi, There is a high focus on Cyber Security at present and thus on backing up config files and databases.It is my understanding that the node configs, NMS database and NP database are backed up automatically every night on our network but I'm not sure where they are saved. I know where the node configs are saved but can you please tell me the location of the NMS and NP backups? If these are not backed up automatically can you advise on how we set this up?  Thanks

tickets.Subject: FOXMAN-UN: VC4 not discovered
tickets.Case Description: Local VC4 cross-connections are made in NORDL150TS1/ZANDV380TS1.  I?m not able to find them back in NP. I did a ForcePolling, Agent in Suspend/Run without any success. I created similar local VC4 in other nodes, they were discovered automatically. I removed ? NORDL150TS1_8.1ZANDV380TSA? and recreate the VC4 ,now  the VC4 is visible in NP. I did not remove the other one ?ZANDV380TS1_8.1ZANDV380TSB?, maybe you can check  what?s going wrong? VC4- CrossConnections: ZANDV380TS1_8.1ZANDV380TSB NORDL150TS1_8.1ZANDV380TSA 2874 L2 checks: see attached file
tickets.Case Resolution Description: R15B improoved the behaviour. It was observed by ELIA for more then 6months. No issues appeared anymore.

tickets.Subject: Network browser: alarm NE -NMS not updated
tickets.Case Description: ELIA: "I believe we had launched a ticket in the past for sections that stays in orange color even after the problem was resolved. The ticket which was open is 20210520-5323485  ( previous ticket was 20201022-5224362) and following the information this would have been solved in R14B. Last week on 29/07/2021 we had again the situation (on the same link PETRO-ZUREN) whereby the alarm was nog clearing itself. I had to do a forced polling from both nodes 4 hours after resolving the problem, in order to clear the problem and change the orange color on the section to black. Can you re-investigate the problem and re-open the ticket 20210520-5323485 please? Please confirm! Thanks in advance" 2875: The issue seams to be same as already had in 20201022-5224362. There it was intended to solve it with R14B. R14B is installed and still the alarm persists.
tickets.Case Resolution Description: The fix at that time was that in case this happens, you can do a force polling or Synchronise Alarm and the issue is gone.

tickets.Subject: GRIMB150TP1 stays toggling even after applying cesun_r4a16_05 / cesne_r4a16_03
tickets.Case Description: Toggling symptoms GRIMB150TP1: You can connect locally to the node as long as the node remains disconnected from our MPLS => no connections from CESM to the Elia routers. As soon as one CESM is connected to Elia router the node starts toggling. After a while you even cannot establish a connection via the local management port.  Things which has been done 06/08/2021 change both of the CESM1 slot 11 and slot 13 => same behavior with new CESM clear the database from both the new CESM and redo the complete configuration from the chassis => no change in behavior load the hotfix esw on both CESM boards cesun_r4a16_05 / cesne_r4a16_03 => no change in behavior Since the fact that support user is only available on the FOXCST version on installed on the Elia jumpserver,(R14B_05) and not possible to create a remote connection the trouble shooting logs cannot be pulled from the node. The FOXCST version available on our laptops to connect locally is R14A_08 and does not contain support user. The chassis will be disconnected from the site and transferred to our labo in Schaarbeek. But we are asking immediate help from ABB about the next steps to do.

tickets.Subject: MALLE150TP1 SAMO issue
tickets.Case Description: Issue on node MALLE150TP1 on 08/08/2021 01:20 - 01:50 Different alarms on node and neighbour node SJOB150TP1 as also others. In the events of the nod MALLE150TP1, I came across an error message 'unsolicited reset' on unit-6. Screenshot below. Coredump has been activated also on both SAMO boards in the node MALLE150TP1 Please investigate and provide explanation / solution.
tickets.Case Resolution Description: Most likely you have faced a false positive oscillator issue. If you would agree with the case closure, this will not prevent you from opening a new one in case needed.

tickets.Subject: OPIC2: vif-1/vif-2 behaviour
tickets.Case Description: CKW has setup a redundant OPIC2 over MPLS-TP service. During testing of the redundancy, they see the following: 1. When disabling the 2nd path by admin-state down vif-2 --> vif-2 at remote end gets to alarm status. As well as cesop interface detects that protected path is not working 2. Enabling back the 2nd path --> all goes to green 3.  When disabling the 1st path by admin-state down vif-1 --> vif-1 and vif-2 at remote end gets to alarm status. As well as cesop interface detects that complete service is not working Investigation by 2875 (Marko) - Believe that OPIC2 does not like when user disables vif-1. - When instead of admin-state down vif-1, user changes the VLAN-ID, the service behaves as expected --> only 1st path is affected. 2nd path runs without problems. - When instead of admin-state down vif-1, user disables the PW, the service behaves as expected --> only 1st path is affected. 2nd path runs without problems. Question: - TEPI2 for example does not allow to admin-state down vif-1. Why does OPIC2 does not follow the same? - Is there a dependence on OPIC2, so that vif-1 must be on for a proper working?

tickets.Subject: FOXMAN E-NP R10C
tickets.Case Description: Hello, There is a problem in the NMS OMAN (Salalah Region). It is FOXMAN R10C06_SP1f_PC2 and they are trying to create new MPLS-TP tunnels from E-NP (screenshot 1) but they have an error message (screenshot 2). I tried to help remotely but I am not able to understand the error, therefore I need expert assistance. Thanks in advance and best regards, Alejandro
tickets.Case Resolution Description: Someone else has either tunnel edit open.. or he is editing service which is using this tunnel. We do not allow to modify 2 services using the same tunnel at once.. or to modify the same tunnel by 2 users.

tickets.Case Description: Server HW Requirements for 330 NEs. Was sind die Mindestanforderungen?
